articles.author: Megan Palin
articles.title: Demolition begins on I-95 bridge after massive tanker fire, sparking traffic nightmare as area schools closed - New York Post
articles.description: Demolition has started on the I-95 bridge damaged in a tanker fire, causing traffic mayhem along one of America’s busiest highways as drivers seek alternative routes.
articles.content:
Crews on Friday started demolishing the Connecticut bridge that was severely damaged when a gas-filled tanker truck crashed on Interstate 95 — causing “horrendous” delays and even closing schools.
